ygData.subject: Party at Veratis'
ygData.msgSnippet: Mustex growled as Grizzltron fired at him. If Ice hadn t stepped between them the blast would have hit him. He reached to draw his weapon when Ice rose her

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Mustex growled as Grizzltron fired at him. If Ice hadn't stepped between th=
em the blast would have hit him. He reached to draw his weapon when Ice ros=
e her wings blocking his shot. "Get down!," he yelled trying to take aim at=
 the insane bot.

"None of that in here." Ice yelled equally demanding, "Th=
is is a place of peace and it'll stay that way." 

Grizzltron wasn't very h=
appy that thier chat was inturupted. He fealt outnumbered and outgunned. Hi=
s firepower was the only thing seperating him and the odds. Veratis wrapped=
 his large bat wings around the bear bot and used his unseemingly strength =
to hold Grizzltrons arms at his sides. "I already warned you once that that=
 will not be permitted in my home." The old scientist bit down on the other=
 bots shoulder draining enough energy to weaken him enough to force him int=
o a CR chamber.

"That should give him some time to cool down." Veratis say=
s transforming back to his robot mode. "Now then Mustex was it? Take Ice wi=
th you and bring your "son" to me and I'll take good care of him."

Ice did=
n't want to go that way, she wanted to return to Lunarpine and the others. =
She thought about thier times together and had to go with Mustex, She remem=
bered all the times she'd tried to help her love and ended up getting herse=
lf hurt and in one case nearly lost her spark. This time she'd trust him to=
 get the job done without worrying about her.
